item.description:
What's so special about this author?
Paul Dolman is an author, entrepreneur, musician, comedian & speaker who took refuge on Martha's Vineyard to heal from a painful breakup. He hitchhiked around the island, & magic flowed in one delightful circumstance after another, including being picked up by Larry David, the creator of the Jerry Seinfeld show & Curb Your Enthusiasm, as well as other rich, famous & powerful people.

His new book?
Hitchhiking with Larry David
(Very witty, hysterical & a easy, inspiring summer read.)

How does this relate to the Law of Attraction?  
Paul's story is a perfect & FUN example of LoA in every way! It's about letting go of fear, following your inner voice, & opening your heart to the love, magic & mystery that permeate everything around you.

His first book, What Matters Most, is under development as a TV series, & this newest book Hitchhiking with Larry David is being considered for a movie.  And it all happened by just following his inspirations, having lots of fun & of cos, connection with the right people ;0)

Great Opportunity for YOU
...to get close & personal with Paul. You'll laugh, be inspired & get personal advise from a powerful attractor.

(Ann & Mark Ide, LoA members & co-organizers of this event, were at the Vineyard this summer, and actually had a very similar "magical" experience with Paul. They bumped into him totally by surprise FOUR times! This happens to Paul all the time. He is magical. YOU TOO CAN BE!!)

Support: Bring books, CDs & DVDs to donate ( guidelines ), shop at More Than Words bookstore &/or online. Enjoy scrumptious desserts & drinks at the cafe.

 

This Event is co-organized with:
-  Metro-West Law Of Attraction Meetup
Ann & Mark Ide, organizers, have been our guest speakers numerous times & are wonderful coaches that inspire folks to new possibilities.

-  More Than Words
More Than Words is a nonprofit social enterprise that empowers youths who are in the foster care system, court involved, homeless, or out of school to take charge of their lives by taking charge of a business. 

******************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 
There's limited seating & we expect a waiting list. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Special AUTHOR event: How to attract connections with famous people
